bug.short_desc: After an error on installing a group, dnf prevents its installation until you "mark remove" it
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
If I try to install the group Xfce Desktop I get this:
rasca@anomalia-rh [~]> sudo dnf group install "Xfce Desktop" Last metadata expiration check: 2:55:49 ago on Wed Apr 5 11:52:28 2017. Error: nothing provides xorg-x11-fonts-ISO8859-1-100dpi needed by xscreensaver-base-1:5.36-3.fc25.x86_64 (try to add '--allowerasing' to command line to replace conflicting packages)
Then I'm unable to try to install it again because it is marked as installed:
rasca@anomalia-rh [~]> sudo dnf group install "Xfce Desktop" Last metadata expiration check: 2:55:52 ago on Wed Apr 5 11:52:28 2017. Environment 'Xfce Desktop' is already installed, skipping. Dependencies resolved. Nothing to do. Complete!
So until you manually mark remove:
rasca@anomalia-rh [~]> sudo dnf group mark remove "Xfce Desktop" Last metadata expiration check: 2:55:56 ago on Wed Apr 5 11:52:28 2017. Environments marked removed: Xfce Desktop
You are unable to retry the installation of the group.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
rasca@anomalia-rh [~]> lsb_release -a LSB Version: :core-4.1-amd64:core-4.1-noarch:cxx-4.1-amd64:cxx-4.1-noarch:desktop-4.1-amd64:desktop-4.1-noarch:languages-4.1-amd64:languages-4.1-noarch:printing-4.1-amd64:printing-4.1-noarch Distributor ID: Fedora Description: Fedora release 25 (Twenty Five) Release: 25 Codename: TwentyFive
This has been fixed in DNF 2.0. Previously, dnf was marking gorups as installed right after run of command. =(
